name: travel-app
description: Travel App - Full Stack Application with React Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && mkdir -p backend_mongo/frontend-dist && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend_mongo/frontend-dist/
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && cd backend_mongo && npm install && npm start
scripts.start: npm run predeploy && cd backend_mongo && npm start
scripts.railway: npm run predeploy && cd backend_mongo && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend_mongo && npm run dev"
